sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MobileLoginHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Client callable script include for Mobile login via SSO</description>
        <name>MobileLoginHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MobileLoginHelper = Class.create();

MobileLoginHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	isPublic: function() {
		return true;
	},

    setStartingPageUrl: function() {
		var session = gs.getSession();
		var startingUrl = session.getProperty("starting_page");
		if (GlideStringUtil.nil(startingUrl)) {
			startingUrl = session.getProperty("nav_to");
			session.putProperty("starting_page", startingUrl);
		}
		
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		gs.log("Starting page has been set to:", startingUrl);
		result.setAttribute("starting_page", startingUrl);
	},

    type: 'MobileLoginHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-09 05:54:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1493aa4b734310108bfb2dc2c4f6a737</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MobileLoginHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile UI" source="com.glide.ui.m">ec4d7c476d2220100acb70b3534330f4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1493aa4b734310108bfb2dc2c4f6a737</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 11:14:30</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>629</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
